mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (b_id, b_game_header, b_writer, b_reg_date, b_content, b_group_id, b_group_seq, b_group_lv) VALUES( 0, #{header}, #{writer}, SYSDATE(), #{content}, #{groupId}, #{groupSeq}, #{groupLevel})
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET b_game_header = #{header}, b_writer = #{writer}, b_reg_date = SYSDATE(), b_content = #{content}, b_group_id = #{groupId}, b_group_seq = #{groupSeq}, b_group_lv = #{groupLevel} WHERE b_id = #{bId}
mapper.select: SELECT b1.b_id as bId, b1.b_game_header as header, b1.b_content as content, b1.b_writer as writer, b1.b_reg_date as regDate, b1.b_group_id as groupId, b1.b_group_seq as groupSeq, b1.b_group_lv as groupLevel, COUNT(b2.b_group_id)-1 AS cmts FROM board b1 LEFT JOIN board b2 ON b1.b_id = b2.b_group_id GROUP BY b1.b_id Having b1.b_group_lv = 0 AND b_game_header = #{header} ORDER BY b1.b_group_id DESC, b1.b_group_seq ASC LIMIT #{skip}, #{count};
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET b_group_seq = b_group_seq + 1 WHERE b_group_id = #{groupId} AND b_group_seq >= #{groupSeq};
mapper.select: SELECT b_id, b_game_header, b_writer, b_reg_date, b_content, b_group_id, b_group_seq, b_group_lv FROM board WHERE b_group_lv != 0 AND b_group_id = #{groupId} ORDER BY b_group_id DESC, b_group_seq ASC;
